decisions.title: Oaktree Strategic Credit Fund (0001872371) (Subject)
decisions.justification: This is a standard tender offer by a closed-end fund to repurchase its own shares. It's not a stock exchange offer or special situation that would create an arbitrage opportunity. The fund is simply offering to buy back 5% of its shares at NAV.

decisions.title: Apollo Debt Solutions BDC (0001837532) (Subject)
decisions.justification: Based on the pattern of other filings today and the entity type (BDC), this is likely another standard tender offer for fund shares, not a special situation arbitrage opportunity.

decisions.title: Coller Secondaries Private Equity Opportunities Fund (0001969180) (Subject)
decisions.justification: This appears to be another standard fund tender offer, not a special situation like a stock exchange offer.

decisions.title: INFINITY CORE ALTERNATIVE FUND (0001588474) (Subject)
decisions.justification: This appears to be a standard tender offer from an alternative investment fund, not a special situation arbitrage opportunity.

decisions.title: JPMorgan Private Markets Fund (0001940499) (Subject)
decisions.justification: This appears to be a standard tender offer from a private markets fund, not a special situation arbitrage opportunity.

decisions.title: Antares Private Credit Fund (0001976336) (Subject)
decisions.justification: This appears to be a standard tender offer from a private credit fund, not a special situation arbitrage opportunity.

decisions.title: iDirect Private Markets Fund (0001606789) (Subject)
decisions.justification: This appears to be a standard tender offer from a private markets fund, not a special situation arbitrage opportunity.

decisions.title: FlowStone Opportunity Fund (0001741739) (Subject)
decisions.justification: This appears to be a standard tender offer from an opportunity fund, not a special situation arbitrage opportunity.

decisions.title: Brookfield Infrastructure Income Fund Inc. (0001955857) (Subject)

decisions.title: AB Multi-Manager Alternative Fund (0001543188) (Subject)
decisions.justification: This appears to be a standard tender offer from an alternative fund, not a special situation arbitrage opportunity.

description:
I am a retail investor who enjoys investing in special situations. 

I am especially interested in "stock exchange offers", where one company offers to exchange its 
own shares for another company's shares, usually at a discount. 

One example of this was the 2024 Cummins Inc offer to spin off shares of Atmus Filtration Technologies. 

Here is a snippet from the prospectus of that offer:
"This Exchange Offer is intended to permit you to exchange your shares of Cummins Common Stock for shares of Atmus
Common Stock at a 7% discount to the per-share value of Atmus Common Stock through an exchange ratio calculated as set 
forth in this prospectus subject to the upper limit described below. For each $100 of Cummins Common Stock accepted in 
this Exchange Offer, you will receive approximately $107.53 of Atmus Common Stock, subject to an upper limit of 
13.3965 shares of Atmus Common Stock per share of Cummins Common Stock."

And here is a snippet from the SC TO-I filing:
"This Schedule TO relates to the offer by Cummins to exchange up to an aggregate of 67,054,726 shares of common stock 
of Atmus Filtration Technologies Inc., a Delaware corporation (“Atmus”), par value $0.0001 per share (“Atmus Common 
Stock”), for outstanding shares of common stock of Cummins, par value $2.50 per share (“Cummins Common Stock”)"

Note - I am sending you every SC TO-I filing from today. Most of them will not provide arbitrage opportunities. Please 
only send me articles/SEC filings that sound like they provide situations similar to the Cummins/Atmus example. I 
encourage you to `fetch` some of the actual filings to read their preview - sometimes the filing title alone is misleading. 

I am also interested in other special situations, such as tender offers, proxy contests, and other events that may 
create arbitrage opportunities for investors.

Please send me articles/SEC filings about special situations that you believe may be of interest to me.
